import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Layout, Menu, Breadcrumb, Button, Dropdown, message } from 'antd'; import { UserOutlined, LaptopOutlined, NotificationOutlined, DownOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import 'antd/dist/antd.css' import './home.scss' const { SubMenu } = Menu; const { Header, Content, Sider } = Layout; function setCookie(key, val, iday) { //key 键名，val 键值， iday 多少天后失效 let time = new Date(); let today = time.getDate();//日 time.setDate(today + iday); document.cookie = key + '=' + val + ';expires=' + time + ';path=/'; } function Home(props) { const [name, changename] = useState('') useEffect(() => { console.log(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('name'))); changename(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('name'))) }, []) const onClick = ({ key }) => { if (key == 2) { message.info(`退出成功`); //清除cookie setCookie('name', '', -1); props.history.push('/login') } }; const menu = ( 个人信息 退出 ); return (

本来生活网后台系统

e.preventDefault()}> 欢迎，{name} {/* */}
